title: Bug 6125 - JAR packager reports open files very late
description: When pressing finish, the JAR creation process fails with the error message 'JAR creation failed: Unsaved Editors'.
OB: When attempting to create a JAR file with unsaved editors, the JAR packager reports the failure very late in the process.
EB: I expect to be able to create a JAR file with unsaved editors. If this is not possible, there should be a dialog prompt asking to save the unsaved editors before proceeding with the JAR creation process.
SR:
To reproduce the issue: 
1. Open a file and make changes without saving.
2. Open the JAR packager for the project containing the unsaved file.
3. Enter all the required information such as path, destination, name of JAR packager description, etc.
4. Attempt to create the JAR file.
